author: Jessica Yun
title: ‘A lot of trends start here’: Nespresso wants to win the cost of living war in Australia
description: Nespresso’s new Oceania managing director Stefan Vermeulen is focused on protecting the coffee pod maker’s premium brand and spruiking its sustainability credentials.

author: Megan Specia
title: Has Coffee Finally Ousted Tea as the U.K.’s Favorite Hot Drink?
description: Recent studies suggest coffee has stolen Britons’ hearts. But for cafe patrons in a city that hosts some of the nation’s oldest coffeehouses, it’s complicated.

author: Standard Business
title: Lukewarm start to coffee reforms drive puts farmers on edge
description: Smallholder farmers are becoming increasingly frustrated by the slow pace of the process being spearheaded by Deputy President Rigathi Gachagua.

author: Emily Chan
title: She Went On A Date With A Guy Whose Dating Profile Photos Were Clearly From A Decade Ago, And Then He Told Her About His Toenail Clipping Collection
description: TikToker Ivy (@ivydarrell_) is sharing about the time she went out with a guy who not only spilled coffee all over but thought that talking about his toenail clipping collection was an appropriate first-date conversation. Perhaps the guy was just nervous. After all, going on a date with someone you’ve never met before is pretty […]

author: Ken Hashizume
title: Charges laid in hate-motivated assault in Kitchener, Ont.: police
description: A 61-year-old man is facing charges after a woman was attacked with hot coffee. The incident occurred Friday afternoon in the area of Victoria Street North and Weber Street West.

author: Kathryn Shattuck
title: Maria Bamford’s 10 Favorite Things
description: “There is the danger of being Dan Browned,” said the comedian and author of “Sure, I’ll Join Your Cult.” Debtors Anonymous, coffee-shop chitchat and a well-timed pool gag help her stay afloat.

author: Elizabeth Gregory and Dominique Hines
title: The best free exhibitions in London – get your culture fix and keep your money for coffee
description: Want to have a fun day out but also save those pennies? These free London art exhibitions are perfect

author: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Dianne Bourne)
title: Manchester Food and Drink Festival Awards: Manchester's best bars, restaurants, takeaways and chefs nominated
description: See all the nominees for best restaurant and best chef, best takeaway, best coffee shop and the best foodie neighbourhood - and have your vote
